projects.description: This project shows quotes from famous musicians by making a random selection from an array of quote objects. Aside from the user clicking the button, the app automatically changes the background color and displayed quote every 10 seconds.
Break up a long list of students into separate pages that can be easily viewed. This simple but useful pagination program can work with short or long lists of data.

Validate a submission form to help prepare data to be more usable. This form features is for a fictional tech conference. It features multiple selections, conditional checkboxes and won't submit unless multiple criteria are met.
